TEXT.TITLE: NIPPON SIGNAL ISSUES 50 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Nippon Signal Co Ltd is issuing 50 mln Swiss franc of five year notes with warrants, paying an indicated 1-3/8 pct, lead manager Morgan Stanley said. Terms will be fixed on April 2 with payment due April 22. The notes are guaranteed by Fuji Bank Ltd. REUTER
